signIn.description: Simtropolis has a daily limit of 20 downloads for anonymous users. Sign it to bypass the limit.
signIn.label: Sign In

AuthorList.emptyList: No authors found for these filters

BackupPluginsModal.confirmation: Do you want to back up your {{plugins}} and {{regions}} folders?
BackupPluginsModal.description: Welcome and thanks for trying out $t(General:app)! While this tool is meant to be compatible with external content, and will not modify existing files without permission and automatic backups, it is also still experimental, and we suggest creating full backups of your current {{plugins}} and {{regions}} folders.
BackupPluginsModal.pluginsSuccess: Your {{plugins}} folder was backed up as {{pluginsBackup}}.
BackupPluginsModal.regionsSuccess: Your {{regions}} folder was backed up as {{regionsBackup}}.
BackupPluginsModal.title: $t(General:app)

Check4GBPatchModal.confirmation: Do you want to apply the $t(General:4gbpatch)?
Check4GBPatchModal.description:
The $t(General:4gbpatch) is a one-time patch that turns on the Large-Address-Aware flag in the 'SimCity 4.exe' executable, increasing its virtual memory (RAM) usage cap from 2GB to 4GB. This allows the game to make better use of modern hardware and is necessary to run resource-intensive mods, such as the $t(General:nam)'s improved pathfinding.

A backup will be automatically created next to the original file.

System Requirements: 8GB of RAM
Check4GBPatchModal.title: $t(General:4gbpatch)

CheckDgVoodooModal.description: SimCity 4 is not compatible with modern DirectX. Installing and configuring DgVoodoo 2 may resolve rendering issues. See https://community.simtropolis.com/files/file/36227-dgvoodoo-2-simcity-4-edition/.
CheckDgVoodooModal.title: $t(General:dgVoodoo)

createBackup.description: Create a backup of this city
createBackup.label: Backup

growify.label: Growify
growify.modalDescription: Convert plopped buildings to normal growables. This is primarily meant to fully enable growable lots placed with 'buildingplop' or 'lotplop' cheats, in particular for residential lots, which will always abandon otherwise. It also enables industrial fret and normal redevelopment after destruction.

historical.label: Make historical
historical.modalDescription: Mark all lots of the given RCI types as historical. This prevents them from being redeveloped.

restoreBackup.description: Restore the city from this backup
restoreBackup.label: Restore

CreateProfileModal.description: Profiles allow you to enable different mods while playing different regions, without having to manually move and rename folders, and without storing copies of any files.

from.description: You can either duplicate one of your existing profiles or create a new profile from a predefined template.
from.label: Create from

id.description: Unique ID corresponding to the configuration filename in Profiles folder. Cannot be modified later.

CreateProfileModal.title: Create profile

CreateVariantModal.description: Local variants allow you to freely customize and overwrite all files from a package, while still benefitting from the functionalities of the Manager. You can create different versions to be used in different profiles.

from.label: Create from
from.manyFiles: This package is very large. Each local variant will use additional disk space.
from.notInstalled: The source variant will be installed before copying.

id.description: Unique ID for the new variant. Cannot be modified later.

CreateVariantModal.title: Create local variant
